changeSet.id: migrate DP title and order name for distribution event
changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: update catissue_distri_event_param devent join catissue_distribution d on d.identifier = devent.distribution_id join catissue_order ordr on ordr.identifier = d.order_id left join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on dp.identifier = ordr.distribution_protocol_id set devent.DP_Title = dp.TITLE, devent.order_name = ordr.name where devent.identifier is not null

changeSet.id: migrate DP title and order name for distribution event
changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: merge into catissue_distri_event_param t2 using ( select dp.TITLE as DPTITLE, ordr.NAME as ORDERNAME, d.identifier as distriId from catissue_distribution d join catissue_order ordr on ordr.identifier = d.order_id left join catissue_distribution_protocol dp on dp.identifier = ordr.distribution_protocol_id ) t1 on (t2.distribution_id = t1.distriId AND t2.identifier is not null) when matched then update set t2.DP_TITLE = t1.DPTITLE, t2.ORDER_NAME = t1.ORDERNAME
